metadata.title: CVE-2022-35255 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A weak randomness in WebCrypto keygen vulnerability exists in Node.js 18due to a change with EntropySource() in SecretKeyGenTraits::DoKeyGen() insrc/crypto/crypto_keygen.cc. There are two problems with this: 1) It doesnot check the return value, it assumes EntropySource() always succeeds, butit can (and sometimes will) fail. 2) The random data returnedbyEntropySource() may not be cryptographically strong and therefore notsuitable as keying material.

criterions.comment: nodejs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
